page.title: 13Tourism in Arden
page.content: The country side in this area is very pretty and people like to come here for their holidays. They like to visit Loch Lomond, go for a sail and visit the islands. Some people come back year after year. Bed and Breakfast is provided at many farms and cottages. People come from all over the world to stay for a night or a week. Many of those who come are Americans. Some families move into a caravan beside their homes in the summer in order to provide Bed and Breakfast in their houses. It is a a very busy time and the children help to set the table and make the beds.
